words.en: The Inevitable Reality!
What||(is) the Inevitable Reality
And what||will make you know||what||(is) the Inevitable Reality

words.en: Denied||Thamud||and Aad||the Striking Calamity

words.id: maka adapun||kaum Tsamud||maka mereka dibinasakan||dengan teriakan/kejadian luar biasa

words.en: And as for||Aad||they were destroyed||by a wind||screaming||violent

words.id: dia menimpakannya(angin itu)||atas mereka||tujuh||malam||dan delapan||hari||terus menerus||kamu melihat||kaum||padanya/pada waktu itu||mati bergelimpangan||seakan-akan mereka||batang||korma||lapuk/tumbang
words.en: Which He imposed||upon them||(for) seven||nights||and eight||days||(in) succession||so you would see||the people||therein||fallen||as if they were||trunks||(of) date-palms||hollow

translations.text: Sakkhara-haa alaihim sab'a la-yaalinw Wa-samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah

words.en: Then do||you see||of them||any||remains

words.id: dan telah datang||Fir'aun||dan orang-orang||sebelumnya||dan negeri-negeri yang runtuh/terbalik||dengan kesalahan-kesalahan
words.en: And came||Firaun||and (those)||before him||and the overturned cities||with sin

translations.text: Wa-jaaa'a Firawnu Wa-man qablahoo wal-mu'tafikaatu bil-khaati'ah

words.id: maka mereka mendurhakai||rasul||Tuhan mereka||maka Dia menyiksa mereka||siksaan||sangat keras
words.en: And they disobeyed||(the) Messenger||(of) their Lord||so He seized them||(with) a seizure||exceeding

translations.text: Fa'asaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa-akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah

words.en: Indeed We||when||overflowed||the water||We carried you||in||the sailing (ship)

translations.text: innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah

words.en: That We might make it||for you||a reminder||and would be conscious of it||an ear||conscious

translations.text: Li-naj'alahaa lakum tazki-ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa uzununw waa'iyah

words.en: Then when||is blown||in||the trumpet||a blast||single

translations.text: Fa-izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah

words.en: And are lifted||the earth||and the mountains||and crushed||(with) a crushing||single

translations.text: Wa-humilatil ardu wal-jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah

words.en: Then (on) that Day||will occur||the Occurrence
And will split||the heaven||so it||(is on) that Day||frail

words.id: dan malaikat||di atas||penjuru-penjuru langit||dan membawa||Arsy||Tuhanmu||di atas mereka||pada hari ini||delapan
words.en: And the Angels||(will be) on||its edges||and will bear||(the) Throne||(of) your Lord||above them||that Day||eight

translations.text: Wal-malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; Wa-yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah

words.en: That Day||you will be exhibited||not||will be hidden||among you||any secret

translations.text: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min-kum khaafiyah

words.id: maka adapun||orang||diberikan||kitabnya||di tangan kanannya||maka ia berkata||marilah/ambillah||bacalah||kitab
words.en: Then as for||(him) who||is given||his record||in his right hand||will say||Here||read||my record!

translations.text: Fa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa-yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah

words.en: Indeed I||was certain||that I||(will) meet||my account
So he||(will be) in||a life||pleasant
In||a Garden||elevated
Its clusters of fruits||hanging near

words.id: makanlah||dan minumlah||dengan senang/penuh kepuasan||dengan apa/disebabkan||kamu lalui/sediakan||pada||hari-hari||telah lalu
words.en: Eat||and drink||(in) satisfaction||for what||you sent before you||in||the days||past

translations.text: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah

words.id: dan adapun||orang yang||diberikan||kitabnya||di tangan kirinya||maka dia berkata||Alangkah baiknya||tidak||diberikan aku||kitab
words.en: But as for||(him) who||is given||his record||in his left hand||will say||O! I wish||not||I had been given||my record

translations.text: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah

words.en: And not||I had known||what||(is) my account
O! I wish it||had been||the end
Not||has availed||me||my wealth
Is gone||from me||my authority
Seize him||and shackle him
Then||(into) the Hellfire||burn him
Then||into||a chain||its length||(is) seventy||cubits||insert him

translations.text: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh

words.en: Indeed, he||(did)||not||believe||in Allah||the Most Great
And (did) not||feel the urge||on||(the) feeding||(of) the poor
So not||for him||today||here||any devoted friend
And not||any food||except||from||(the) discharge of wounds
Not||will eat it||except||the sinners
But nay!||I swear||by what||you see
And what||not||you see
Indeed it (is)||surely (the) Word||(of) a Messenger||noble

words.id: dan tidaklah||ia (Al Qur'an)||dengan perkataan||seorang penyair||sedikit||tidak||kamu beriman
words.en: And not||it||(is the) word||(of) a poet;||little||(is) what||you believe!

translations.text: Wa-maa huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelan maa tu'minoon

words.id: dan tidak||perkataan||dukun/tukang tenung||sedikit||tidak||kamu ingat mengambil pelajaran
words.en: And not||(it is the) word||(of) a soothsayer;||little||(is) what||you remember

translations.text: Wa-laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelan maa tazakkaroon

words.en: (It is) a revelation||from||(the) Lord||(of) the worlds
And if||he (had) fabricated||against Us||some||sayings
Certainly We (would) have seized||him||by the right hand;
Then||certainly We (would) have cut off||from him||the aorta
And not||from you||any||one||[from him]||(could) prevent

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||benar-benar peringatan||bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa
words.en: And indeed it||(is) surely a reminder||for the Allah-fearing

words.en: And indeed We||surely know||that||among you||(are) deniers

words.en: And indeed it||(is) surely a regret||upon||the disbelievers
And indeed it (is)||surely (the) truth||(of) certainty
